thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Nico van den Berg
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Nico van den Berg

author: Nico van den Berg
title: Nico van den Berg
text:
Banggood service is excellent! My experience with issues due to products not working as promised, broken products, products lost during transportation etc. is very positive because Banggood ALWAYS replaced the items.
Banggood handled the issues in a way that I can recommend Banggood as a seller where you can buy without worrying loosing your money on faulty, broken or missing products!
